description: Although she might look younger (her exact age is unknown), Kaoruko Minegishi is http://anidb.net/ch19484 [Izumi]`s senpai at work in this town`s office, and on par with her in terms of looks and breast size. Like her friend she`s a gentle person but a mysterious character with eccentric hobbies such as doing cosplay of game characters. Being curious and a Sci-Fi fan she starts investigating the mysterious shadow creatures that have been observed in the town, and her shooting skills might come in handy for this.
name: Minegishi Kaoruko
